title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems [When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything.] I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame or the content frame).
OB: When launching the Help view and pressing the tab key, it does not perform any action.
EB: We should start the Help view in a way that can be immediately navigated via the keyboard.
SR: To reproduce:  1. Launch the Help view. 2. Press the tab key and observe that it does not have any effect.
